thread.section_title: Comments for Mad Kane's Political Madness
thread.title: Comment on St. Boehner??? (3-Verse Limerick) by Dave Johnson
thread.title_full: Comment on St. Boehner??? (3-Verse Limerick) by Dave Johnson

author: Dave Johnson
title: Comment on St. Boehner??? (3-Verse Limerick) by Dave Johnson
text:
Please don’t tell me that Boehner’s atoned For his sins and for all he’s condoned— That his leaving his job Is a sacrifice (Sob!) For the good of our land. Are you stoned? 
Because all Boehner’s done is postpone The government shut-down he’s sown, And emboldened the loons Anti-government nuts to the bone. 
So kindly don’t ask me to weep For a man who will soon surely reap Lots of wealth from connections (While dodging elections!) 
Tags: John Boehner , Tea Party , Wingnuts   Tuesday, September 29th, 2015 at 4:57   GOP Humor , John Boehner   Republicans Humor , Tea Parties , Wingnuts   “St. Boehner??? (3-Verse Limerick)” Dave Johnson
